article: Our teacher asks us to keep a diary in English. I enjoy doing so because I  _  keeping a diary in English is one of the effective ways to  _  our English writing ability. But  at times  we certainly run up against many difficulties. In the first place, it often happens that we have  _  finding proper words and phrases to give expression to our mind. Secondly, there  _  many idiomatic ways of saying things in Chinese. And it is extremely hard for us to put them  _  English properly. In short, I believe that it is of  _  use to keep a diary in English for the development of our  _  skills.
